title: Arcos del Sitio
description: A majestic aqueduct built during the colonial era, offering panoramic views and a glimpse into Tepotzotlán’s architectural history. It’s a must-visit landmark for photography and exploration.

title: Parque Sierra Tepotzotlán
description: A beautiful natural park in the surrounding hills, perfect for hiking, picnics, and enjoying panoramic views of the town and surrounding landscapes.

title: Plaza de la Cruz
description: A historic square known for its cultural events, local markets, and vibrant community life. Visitors can enjoy traditional foods, crafts, and the lively atmosphere of Tepotzotlán.
